reviewText: Talking about one of the best horse racing movies ever, I remember seeing it years ago with my father! I've been looking for it a long time...Come on high tech put this movie on DVD and hurry! A real tear jerker!!!
....An earlier film about the Sport of Kings...good tale...good acting...and when will some Hollywood sharpshooter transfer this movie to DVD??...SSGT CHRIS SARNO-USMC FMF
